metadata.description: Jeffrey Brown is back - and with a BigHead, no less! Here comes an irreverent and clever super-hero parody featuring the amazing BigHead. His mission? To save an unthankful world while facing the demons of his own failures. Witness inept villains clash with an all-too-emotional hero in an epic graphic novel that leaps all cliches in a single bound. BigHead brings together moral fable, social commentary, and classic comic book action
metadata.name: Bighead
